moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: Fling
moves.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

moves.name: Punishment
moves.description: This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.
